rdf:Description.dc:title: Draft environmental guidelines for the review of subdivisions in Alberta 1998
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Bramm, Richard.
Alberta. Alberta Environmental Protection. Environmental Regulatory Services.
Alberta. Environmental Assessment Division.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton : Alberta Environmental Protection, Environmental Regulatory Service, Environmental Assessment Division, Standards and Guidelines Branch,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Ch.1 - Introduction to the guidelines -- Ch.2 - Guidelines for the evaluation of groundwater supply for unserviced residential subdivisions -- Ch.3 - Guidelines for the evaluation of water table conditions and soil percolation rate for unserviced residential subdivisions -- Ch.4 - Guidelines for the evaluation of river flooding and erosion hazards for residential subdivisions -- Ch.5 - Guidelines for the evaluation of hazards to residential subdivisions from valley slopes -- Ch.6 - Guidelines for the evaluation of lake residential subdivisions -- Appendices.
System requirements for online access: Adobe Acrobat.

Alberta Government Library*Previously published as "Interim guidelines for the evaluation of water table conditions and soil percolation rate for unserviced residential subdivisions - GB 992 A3 A333 1994 and Interim guidelines for the subdivision of land adjacent to steep valley banks - HD 319 A3 A334 1994 and Interim guidelines for the evaluation of groundwater supply for unserviced residential subdivisions using privately owned domestic water wells - TD 405 A333 1994"
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Land subdivision
Land use
Environmental protection
